title: If you could convince Riot to implement ONE community created skin immediately, what would it be?
body:
Personally, I'd LOVE to have a new Karma skin and I've been following the work on the [Dark Gravitation Karma](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4377394) skin for a while.   I'd be happy to see it come into the game, even being a 1375 RP skin.

What skin would you guys want to see come into the game and how much would you spend on it on release day?

replies.body: I've seen a lot of great concepts, but one that comes to mind right now is [Riot Leona](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/nExWq3LF-riot-leona)
{{champion:92}} Pool Party Riven please and thank you!

> {{champion:92}} Pool Party Riven please and thank you!

Seconded

Not necessarily one skin, but any skin with one aesthetic.

_Puppet Orianna, Princess Orianna, Human Orianna_
http://hdw.datawallpaper.com/videogames/orianna-wide-wallpaper-335701.jpg
http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mbqdrrI8851rfqk59o1_1280.jpg
http://thelissastuff.tumblr.com/post/82465998163/orianna

Why are ALL of Oriannas skins so gothic?  Her original skin isn't even gothic at all, it's victorian.  I don't mind gothic (even like the look on some and admit sewn chaos is awesome), but Oriannas awkward and dark misunderstood side is NOT the only facet to her character, yet its the ONLY character attribute any of her skins play off of.  She needs a skin that represents the dancer, the robot that is trying to understand itself, and the human girl whose image she was made in and whose memories she has.
Any answer that inst Dragon Master Swain is just wrong.

http://elohell.net/chill/225079/soraka-skin-concept

This dark Soraka would be AWESOME! (second place: a dark teemo so I could play him)

Battle-bunny Rengar.

Either that or Porp-prophet Malzahar.
The Pulsefire Vayne Skin I saw a little while ago.

A rough concept of an " Officer Braum" that I saw on GD a while back.

Idk how much I'd spend, given I dont even own Braum yet, but still.
Shinigami Thresh (Not mine, but this is awesome)
